description:
Houkouin, the mysterious woman she has appeared around Kei`ichiro several times, attacks him in a giant robot.  She attacks him to learn the power of his own giant robot, Susanwo, but overwhelmes Kei`ichiro instead.  A surprising person saves him...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 倒錯の性魔, 法光院襲来!
